languages.text: "Из-за него еще и моя сеть торговцев посыпалась, словно плохо собранный хронометр. Ни прибыли, ни выгоды никакой — одни убытки! А все потому, что моя правая рука нежится сейчас в грубых объятиях цепей на одном из астероидов Футфола. Быть может, заглянем на огонек к Фалько? Ваш внушительный вид уж точно развяжет ему язык... А, может, заодно и руки моим ребятам освободит".

traits.locale_text: "Из-за него еще и моя сеть торговцев посыпалась, словно плохо собранный хронометр. Ни прибыли, ни выгоды никакой — одни убытки! А все потому, что моя правая рука нежится сейчас в грубых объятиях цепей на одном из астероидов Футфола. Быть может, заглянем на огонек к Фалько? Ваш внушительный вид уж точно развяжет ему язык... А, может, заодно и руки моим ребятам освободит".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."
languages.original_text: "Из-за него еще и моя сеть торговцев посыпалась, словно плохо собранный хронометр. Ни прибыли, ни выгоды никакой — одни убытки! А все потому, что моя правая рука нежится сейчас в грубых объятиях цепей на одном из астероидов Футфола. Быть может, заглянем на огонек к Фалько? Ваш внушительный вид уж точно развяжет ему язык... А, может, заодно и руки моим ребятам освободит".

traits.locale_text: "He also threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profit, only damages! Largely because my right hand is resting in the unkind embrace of the chains on one of the Footfall asteroids. How about we pay Falco a visit of courtesy? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe untie the hands of my crew."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He also threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profit, only damages! Largely because my right hand is resting in the unkind embrace of the chains on one of the Footfall asteroids. How about we pay Falco a visit of courtesy? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe untie the hands of my crew."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Il m'a mis des bâtons dans les roues, à tel point que mon réseau de relations commerciales s'est disloqué comme un chrono assemblé avec les pieds. Zéro rentrée d'argent, zéro profit, zéro compensation ! Et tout ça pour quoi ? Parce que mon bras droit est enchaîné à l'un des astéroïdes de Castel. Que diriez-vous de rendre une petite visite de courtoisie à Falco ? Je suis sûre que votre stature imposante lui déliera la langue... Et avec elle, si nous avons de la chance, les cordes qui retiennent mon équipage. »
languages.original_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."

traits.locale_text: « Il m'a mis des bâtons dans les roues, à tel point que mon réseau de relations commerciales s'est disloqué comme un chrono assemblé avec les pieds. Zéro rentrée d'argent, zéro profit, zéro compensation ! Et tout ça pour quoi ? Parce que mon bras droit est enchaîné à l'un des astéroïdes de Castel. Que diriez-vous de rendre une petite visite de courtoisie à Falco ? Je suis sûre que votre stature imposante lui déliera la langue... Et avec elle, si nous avons de la chance, les cordes qui retiennent mon équipage. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “他给我的贸易网络泼了一盆冷水，让我的贸易网络像失灵的计时器一样分崩离析。没有收入，没有利润，只有损失！这一切都是因为我的副手被关在了落脚港的小行星上。不如咱们去拜访一下法尔科吧？我相信，你威风凛凛的样子一定会让他松口……而且说不定，说不定，他还会放走我的船员。”
languages.original_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."

traits.locale_text: “他给我的贸易网络泼了一盆冷水，让我的贸易网络像失灵的计时器一样分崩离析。没有收入，没有利润，只有损失！这一切都是因为我的副手被关在了落脚港的小行星上。不如咱们去拜访一下法尔科吧？我相信，你威风凛凛的样子一定会让他松口……而且说不定，说不定，他还会放走我的船员。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Er hat mir einen dicken Strich durch die Rechnung gemacht, mein Handelsnetzwerk ist zerfallen wie ein schlecht zusammengesetztes Chrono. Kein Einkommen, kein Gewinn, nur Verluste! Und das alles nur, weil meine rechte Hand auf einem der Asteroiden von Footfall festsitzt. Wollen wir Falco vielleicht einen kleinen Höflichkeitsbesuch abstatten? Eure bedrohliche Visage wird seine Zunge gewiss lockern ... Und vielleicht auch die gebundenen Hände meiner Crew lösen."
languages.original_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."

traits.locale_text: "Er hat mir einen dicken Strich durch die Rechnung gemacht, mein Handelsnetzwerk ist zerfallen wie ein schlecht zusammengesetztes Chrono. Kein Einkommen, kein Gewinn, nur Verluste! Und das alles nur, weil meine rechte Hand auf einem der Asteroiden von Footfall festsitzt. Wollen wir Falco vielleicht einen kleinen Höflichkeitsbesuch abstatten? Eure bedrohliche Visage wird seine Zunge gewiss lockern ... Und vielleicht auch die gebundenen Hände meiner Crew lösen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Ha generado un completo caos, haciendo que mi red comercial se desmoronara como un crono mal ensamblado. ¡Cero ingresos, solo daños! Y todo porque han encadenado a mi mano derecha en uno de los asteroides de Paso. ¿Qué le parece si le hacemos una visita a Falco? Seguro que su imponente presencia hará que hable... Y posiblemente libere a mi tripulación».
languages.original_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."

traits.locale_text: «Ha generado un completo caos, haciendo que mi red comercial se desmoronara como un crono mal ensamblado. ¡Cero ingresos, solo daños! Y todo porque han encadenado a mi mano derecha en uno de los asteroides de Paso. ¿Qué le parece si le hacemos una visita a Falco? Seguro que su imponente presencia hará que hable... Y posiblemente libere a mi tripulación».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アイツはあたしの仕事を滅茶苦茶にして、下手に組み立てたクロノのように、取引の繋がりをぶっ壊したんだ。収入なし、利益なし、あるのは被害だけ！全部、フットフォールのある小惑星にあたしの右手が鎖で繋がれているせいだよ。ファルコに表敬訪問できないかい？アンタの堂々とした佇まいに、アイツは絶対に口を緩める…それでもし、もしかしたら、あたしのクルーを解放してくれるかも」
languages.original_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."

traits.locale_text: 「アイツはあたしの仕事を滅茶苦茶にして、下手に組み立てたクロノのように、取引の繋がりをぶっ壊したんだ。収入なし、利益なし、あるのは被害だけ！全部、フットフォールのある小惑星にあたしの右手が鎖で繋がれているせいだよ。ファルコに表敬訪問できないかい？アンタの堂々とした佇まいに、アイツは絶対に口を緩める…それでもし、もしかしたら、あたしのクルーを解放してくれるかも」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Adi herif, işime çomak soktu. Ticaret ağım, işçiliği berbat bir krono gibi çöküverdi. Ne gelirim var ne de kârım. Anca zarar ediyorum! Sağkolum Binliman'ın asteroitlerinden birine zincirlenmiş olmasa şunların hiçbirini yaşamayacağım. Falco'yu bir ziyaret etsek mi? Şüphesiz ki heybetini görünce dilinin bağı çözülüverir. Hatta belki... Belki bu vesileyle tayfam da kurtulur."
languages.original_text: "He threw a wrench into the works, making my trade network fall apart like a badly assembled chrono. No income, no profits, only damages! All because my right hand is chained up on one of Footfall's asteroids. How about we pay Falco a courtesy visit? I am sure your imposing visage will loosen his tongue... And maybe, just maybe, untie the hands of my crew."
